Posts.Content: Hi, I have also had tamoxifen & Letrozole and now been on anastrozole for 8 weeks with horrendous side effects, I have been told the side effects should ease after 12 weeks, my choices are becoming limited, can anyone help or advise? Lots of hair loss, muscle & joint pain, & swelling, walking like an old granny, and a year after surgery have cording, been told to take painkillers, Â & do exercises for cording ..... Any advise would be more than welcome
Posts.Title: RE: anastrozole
